# Kwanti - Portfolio Analytics Platform

---

**Website:** https://kwanti.com/  
**Category:** Portfolio Analytics & Proposal Generation  
**Description:** Kwanti delivers portfolio analytics, stress testing, and proposals for financial advisors to build model portfolios, analyze client portfolios, and generate proposals for prospects.

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Monthly Price | Annual Price | Per User Basis | Report Limits | Notes |
|------|---------------|--------------|----------------|---------------|-------|
| **Solo Advisor** | $195/month | $175/month (save 10%) | Per user | 50 PDF reports/month | Ideal for solo advisors or breakaway advisors |
| **Small Firm** | $175/month | Contact for annual | Per user (min 5 seats) | 50 reports/month × license count | Minimum 5 users, includes data sharing |
| **Enterprise** | Contact Us | Contact Us | Custom | Custom | For larger RIAs, broker-dealers, and advisor networks |

### Pricing Notes
- **Free Trial:** 30-day fully-enabled trial (PDF reports have 'Trial Sample' watermark)
- **Add-Ons:**
  - SMA Support: $75/month
  - Statement Extraction: $75/month
- **Payment:** Monthly subscription (recurring) or yearly subscription (no auto-renewal)
- **Refund Policy:** No refund for partial months; yearly subscriptions can be canceled within first 30 days for refund
- **License Terms:** Per advisor basis; not shareable except for administrative assistants with limited use

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- Asset allocation analysis with drill-downs
- Equity sector analysis
- Equity style analysis
- 30 years backtest capability
- Yield/income analysis
- Tax/Expenses analysis
- Correlation calculator
- Risk profile assessment
- Portfolio stress test
- Portfolio optimization
- Upload asset history
- Upload model portfolio history
- Branded PDF proposal/reports
- Excel import/export
- Partners integrations
- Model marketplace access

### Advanced Features
- Interactive "what-if" analytics
- Data visualization for presentations
- Client risk profiling questionnaire
- Personalized investment policy statement generation
- Custom client proposals with built-in PDF editor
- Hypothetical scenario testing
- Performance reporting
- Blended benchmarks
- SMA support (add-on)

### Enterprise-Only Features
- Centralized model distribution
- Comprehensive compliance oversight
- Tailored reporting for all firm roles
- Dedicated management
- Robust dashboards
- Volume discounts for multiple licenses
- Shared portfolio designation between users

### Limitations
- PDF report limits per month (50 for solo, scaled for firms)
- License is individual use only
- Cannot be shared (except administrative assistants with limited use)
- No auto-renewal on yearly subscriptions
- No refund for partial months on monthly plans

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### SMA Support
**What it does:** Enables Separately Managed Account analysis and reporting
**Key Features:** SMA-specific analytics, performance tracking, compliance reporting
**Pricing:** $75/month add-on
**Use Cases:** Advisors managing SMA portfolios, institutional clients

### Statement Extraction
**What it does:** Automated extraction of portfolio data from account statements
**Key Features:** OCR-based extraction, multi-format support, validation tools
**Pricing:** $75/month add-on
**Use Cases:** Reducing manual data entry, multi-custodian aggregation

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 18+ partners (custodians, technology platforms, and model providers)

Kwanti is integrated with all major custodians and RIA vendors, enabling seamless data flow and portfolio synchronization. Portfolios are automatically synchronized when you start Kwanti, eliminating manual transfer operations.

### Key Integrations (7 Detailed)

#### 1. Altruist (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Automatic portfolio synchronization with Altruist custodian accounts
- **Data synced:** Account holdings, balances, positions, transaction history
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (via Kwanti integrations menu)
- **Limitations:** Requires active Altruist account
- **Documentation:** https://support.kwanti.com/hc/en-us/sections/22774051078423-Integrations

#### 2. Betterment for Advisors (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Betterment's RIA custody platform
- **Data synced:** Client portfolios, holdings, performance data
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (account linking)
- **Limitations:** Must be a Betterment for Advisors client
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/betterment/

#### 3. Advyzon (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional (import models from Advyzon)
- **What it does:** Imports models from Advyzon into Kwanti; automatic portfolio updates
- **Data synced:** Model portfolios, account data, performance
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (sign in to Kwanti → Integrations → Advyzon)
- **Limitations:** Advyzon platform required
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/advyzon-integration/

#### 4. Orion (Portfolio Accounting)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Seamless integration with Orion's portfolio accounting software
- **Data synced:** Account data, holdings, performance, billing information
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (requires Orion account setup)
- **Limitations:** Orion subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/partners/orion/

#### 5. Redtail (CRM)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** One-way (Kwanti ← Redtail)
- **What it does:** Connects with Redtail CRM for client data access
- **Data synced:** Client contact information, account associations
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** Redtail subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/partners/redtail/

#### 6. Schwab Advisor Services (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Charles Schwab's advisor custody platform
- **Data synced:** Account holdings, positions, balances
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Schwab institutional account needed)
- **Limitations:** Schwab advisor services account required
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/partners/schwab-advisor-services/

#### 7. Fidelity Wealthscape (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Fidelity's institutional platform
- **Data synced:** Account data, holdings, performance metrics
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (requires Fidelity institutional relationship)
- **Limitations:** Fidelity Wealthscape access required
- **Documentation:** https://kwanti.com/partners/fidelity-wealthscape/

### Other Partners & Integrations
- **Custodians:** Pershing, TD Ameritrade Institutional, Goldman Sachs
- **Technology:** Black Diamond (SS&C), Blueleaf, Capitect, Folio Institutional, iRebal, Portfolio Pathway, TradePMR, Addepar, Riskalyze
- **Model Providers:** BlackRock, WisdomTree, State Street, LSAPortfolios, Wilshire, SSGA

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native/Embedded:** Direct integration via Kwanti platform
- **API-Based:** RESTful API connections for data sync
- **Data Link:** Automatic portfolio synchronization
- **Webhook Support:** Not explicitly documented (primarily API-based)
- **Third-Party:** Integration via partner platforms

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **Public API:** Yes - Kwanti provides API access for integrations
- **Documentation:** Available at https://support.kwanti.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000493527
- **Authentication:** OAuth-based for most integrations

### Rate Limits
- Not publicly documented - likely tied to subscription tier
- Professional support recommended for high-volume use

### Authentication Methods
- OAuth 2.0 for primary integrations
- API tokens for custom integrations (enterprise tier)

### Developer Portal
- Available for enterprise customers
- Contact sales for access: sales@kwanti.com

### Public Documentation Assessment
- **Quality:** Good - knowledge base articles available
- **Limitations:** Some integration details require login
- **API Docs:** Available behind login for enterprise

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Elegant User Interface:** Advisors value the simple, intuitive design
2. **30-Year Historical Data:** Extensive backtesting capabilities for portfolio analysis
3. **Portfolio Stress Testing:** Comprehensive stress test tools for client presentations
4. **Custom Proposal Generation:** Built-in PDF editor for branded, professional proposals
5. **Model Marketplace Access:** Access to institutional-quality model portfolios
6. **Major Custodian Integrations:** Works with all major custodians (Schwab, Fidelity, Pershing, etc.)
7. **Regular Enhancements:** Partners integrations updated frequently
8. **Affordable Entry Point:** $195/month is competitive for portfolio analytics
9. **Free Trial:** 30-day full-featured trial with watermark
10. **SMA Support:** Add-on for separately managed accounts

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **PDF Report Limits:** 50 reports/month on solo plan may be restrictive for high-volume advisors
2. **No Auto-Renewal:** Yearly subscriptions don't automatically renew (may be pro or con)
3. **Per-User Licensing:** License is individual use only, not shareable between advisors
4. **Limited to Financial Advisors:** Platform designed specifically for advisors, not retail investors
5. **Add-On Costs:** SMA support and statement extraction are $75/month add-ons each
6. **No Refund Policy:** No refunds for partial months on monthly subscriptions

### Alternatives (with brief comparisons)
1. **Black Diamond (SS&C):** More established but likely more expensive; similar integrations
2. **Orion:** More comprehensive portfolio accounting, but may be overkill for analytics-only needs
3. **Riskalyze:** More focused on risk tolerance, less on portfolio analytics and proposals
4. **Nitrogen:** Broader platform including risk, research, and planning (see Nitrogen profile)
5. **Income Lab:** Focused on retirement income planning, not portfolio analytics (see Income Lab profile)

### Use Cases: "Ideal For"
- **Solo Advisors:** Affordable entry point at $195/month
- **Breakaway Advisors:** Clean interface, quick portfolio analysis
- **RIA Firms (2-9 users):** Small firm tier with data sharing
- **Advisors Needing Proposals:** Built-in proposal generation with branding
- **Model Portfolio Builders:** Access to model marketplace and optimization tools
- **Advisors with Multiple Custodians:** Works with major custodians including Altruist

### Use Cases: "Not Ideal For"
- **Large RIAs (10+ users):** May need enterprise pricing
- **High-Volume PDF Users:** Solo plan limits to 50 reports/month
- **Non-Advisor Users:** Platform designed for financial advisors only
- **Retirement Income Focus:** Better suited for portfolio analytics than retirement planning
- **Teams Needing Shared Licensing:** Per-user licensing model may not fit collaborative teams

### Key Differentiators (5 items)
1. **Elegant Simplicity:** Combines powerful analytics with clean, simple UI that advisors actually enjoy using
2. **30-Year Backtesting:** Extensive historical data for meaningful stress testing and scenario analysis
3. **Model Marketplace:** Direct access to institutional-quality model portfolios from major asset managers
4. **Proposal Generation:** Built-in PDF editor creates branded, professional client proposals quickly
5. **Altruist Integration:** Modern custodian integration, plus traditional custodians (Schwab, Fidelity, etc.)

## Research Methodology Notes

### Sources Accessed

7. **PR Newswire:** Betterment integration announcement
8. **Capterra & G2:** Third-party review platforms
9. **InvestmentNews & WealthManagement.com:** Industry publications

### Limitations Encountered
- **Support Portal:** Some integration details require login to Kwanti account
- **API Documentation:** Detailed developer docs not publicly accessible
- **Enterprise Pricing:** Custom pricing requires direct contact with sales
- **Contract Terms:** Specific contract details not publicly available

### Recommended Next Steps
1. **Enterprise Inquiry:** Contact sales for custom pricing if firm has 10+ users
2. **API Documentation:** Request developer documentation for custom integrations
3. **Trial Evaluation:** Start 30-day trial to test with real portfolio data
4. **Integration Testing:** Connect with primary custodian (Altruist, Schwab, etc.)
5. **Team Training:** Evaluate training options during trial period
6. **Comparison:** Test against alternatives (Black Diamond, Orion, Nitrogen) for specific use cases
